perksModalButton.continueToPartner:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to navigate to the partner's website to claim a perk.
**UI Location**: Perks modal footer, left button.
**When Users See This**: After opening a perk modal and reviewing perk details.
**Technical Context**: `websiteDomain` variable must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Continue to %{websiteDomain}"
perksModalButton.close:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to close the perk details modal.
**UI Location**: Perks modal footer, right button.
**When Users See This**: After opening a perk modal.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Close"
perksExternalModalButton.claimPerk:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for a modal explaining that an Exercism account is needed to claim a perk.
**UI Location**: Perks external modal header.
**When Users See This**: When a user tries to claim a perk that requires an Exercism account.
**Technical Context**: Standard heading text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Claim this Perk with an Exercism account!"
perksExternalModalButton.exercismIsNonPr:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text about Exercism and its mission within a perk modal.
**UI Location**: Perks external modal body.
**When Users See This**: When a user tries to claim a perk that requires an Exercism account.
**Technical Context**: Standard paragraph text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Exercism is a not-for-profit organisation. We provide world-class education, a great community, and Perks from our partners. Join Exercism today. It's free!"
perksExternalModalButton.signUp:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to navigate to the Exercism sign-up page.
**UI Location**: Perks external modal footer, left button.
**When Users See This**: When a user needs to create an Exercism account to claim a perk.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Sign up"
perksExternalModalButton.logIn:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to navigate to the Exercism log-in page.
**UI Location**: Perks external modal footer, right button.
**When Users See This**: When an existing user needs to log in to their Exercism account to claim a perk.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Log in"
